mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.review_date, r.review_content, r.user_name, r.product_id, r.review_like, p.product_name FROM t_review r JOIN t_product p on r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.product_id = #{product_id} ORDER BY review_date desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_review (review_id, user_name, product_id, review_content, review_date, review_like) VALUES(review_seq.nextval, #{user_name}, #{product_id}, #{review_content}, sysdate, #{review_like})
